name: Eight Hues of Toxic Ooze
author: Digi
description:
Don't
 drink this! Inky purples shift to blue, cyan, and towards yellow green 
as brightness increases, and saturation falls off in the highlight 
shades making this palette perfect for creating interesting glow and 
lighting effects. Using the brightest shades next to the darkest grants 
an intense amount of contrast for areas of focus while using the 
adjacent shades together grants a satisfyingly gradual transition, 
making this palette versatile in use for both smooth shading and vibrant
 pops of intensity.
